info.name: Duplicate Finder
info.summary: Save some space by finding your duplicate files
info.description:
Click on the icon and find if you have duplicate files.
You can either use the command or the cron job to do a full scan. Each time a new file is uploaded or a file is changed the app automatically checks if a duplicate of this file exists.
## Command usage If you increase the verbosity of the occ command, the file that is currently scanned and the hash will be displayed
```duplicates:find-all [options]```
### Options - `-u --user` scan files of the specified user (-u admin) - `-p --path` limit scan to this path (--path="/alice/files/Photos")
